content: VC 150-10 X Dust extractor Powerful dust extractor for connection with power tools and jobsite clean ups (wet & dry), 8 gallon tank - OSHA compliant with 150 CFM ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Construction vacuums and dust extractors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Sturdy wet/dry dust extractor – built to handle dust extraction and clean-ups when working with all your Hilti power tools Automatic filter cleaning – adaptive filter cleaning maintains consistent suction performance and activates only when necessary, helping reduce noise and work interruptions Built for durability – robust housing, wheels and accessories engineered for the harshest jobsite conditions Easy organization and transport – keep your gear stored with built-in accessories, including a belt strap for extra tool storage space, bungee cords for hose and power cable storage, and optional soft bag for spare filters and more Powerful suction – 150 CFM suction level complies with most OSHA silica dust standards to help reduce harmful dust exposure and improve jobsite safety Applications Dust extraction from grinding, cutting, slitting, drilling and dry coring tools Removing slurry during wet coring applications Wet and dry cleaning Dust extractor for wood and saw dust ### TECHNICAL DATA: Max. Vacuum: 3.55 psi Water capacity: 6 gallon (US) Container capacity: 30 l Technical Data | Max. Vacuum | 3.55 psi | Water capacity | 6 gal (US) | Dust capacity | 75 lb | Application | Cleaning, Drilling and breaking, Wood sawing, Cutting and grinding (light, up to 125 mm / 5 in), Drywall and wood sanding, Wet coring, Socket cutting | Integrated power socket | No | Max socket output current | 11 A | Power source | Corded | Supply cord length | 275.59 in ### ITEMS- 2411708 - Dust extractor VC 150-10 X 120V - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x VC 150-10 X 120V Dust extractor - 1x Filter VC 150-X Gen 2 wet/dry HEPA - 1x Hose 36mm x 4.6m (15 ft) anti-static
